items.title: Copsi
items.description: Copsi is a desktop application which can be used for communication and the exchange of documents between professors, assistants, and students of the University of Applied Sciences Kaiserslautern.

items.title: Convertee
items.description: A compact and user-friendly conversion app for Android systems. Easily convert a large number of units, including currencies.
